sent.orig: Result Enhance the legal awareness, responsibility, service awareness and learning awareness of medical staff.
sent.trans: 结果增强有关工作人员的法律意识、责任意识、服务意识和学习意识。

sent.orig: The whole network of training and network management services the service awareness and management awareness.
sent.trans: 通过对服务网络全程性的培训，提高服务网络管理人员的服务意识和管理意识。

sent.orig: Launched deny children printing, printing exhibition aims to promote quality awareness, customer awareness and cost consciousness.
sent.trans: 举办优质印品、不合格印品展览，旨在提高质量意识、顾客意识及成本意识。

sent.orig: Awareness building is designed to increase awareness of the meaning and importance of valuing diversity.
sent.trans: 认识培训是用来增强对多样性的重要性和意义的认识。

sent.orig: Children learning to read Chinese: Role of phonological awareness and morphological awareness.
sent.trans: 论文发表于第五届华人社会心理与教育测验学术研讨会。
